content: Thirty goals in a season in today's NHL is an elite mark. A player who can score 30 today would have been a 50-goal scorer in times other than the current dead puck era. Max Pacioretty is in the midst of authoring his sixth 30-goal campaign and sat 13th in th… [+14591 chars]
